TopicTitle: LCARS x32, Awesome Star Trek computer Shell.

Articles.Content: LCARS x32 is one of the best Star Trek LCARs recreations in the fact that it is actually functional unlike most of the other LCARS systems you will find which are just screensavers, LCARS x32 is located here. While there are many notable bugs in the software I experimented on my new laptop with it and found that voice commands work almost flawlessly. If you are a fan of Star Trek you should totally check LCARS x32 out!
Well? I see 34 views and no comments and its been almost a day. Was my OP horrible?
I'm always wary of things that mess with my desktop but I just might take this for a spin. Still unsure though.
oh don't worry, you can turn it off.
Oh I installed it before, when I booted into safe-mode it was the default shell! Pretty hilarious how I got rid of a virus from LCARS.
It works on 64 bit and doesn't use much memory.

For something like this, I'd prefer to see screenshots of the product in action as well as technical specifications like memory, cpu usage. Is it using DX10 or 11 for its desktop rendering, does it have touch screen compatibility. You know....silly, insignificant things like that.
